data.title: About Us – Sarawak Belux
data.meta_description: Sarawak Belgium emerged from the Sarawak Group's acquisition of Think and Go and Promoplan. Through these acquisitions, Sarawak has acquired an important role in the Belgian Field Marketing & Brand Activation segment. We operate in various market channels, including Consumer Electronics Goods, FMCG, Cosmetics, DIY & Travel Retail.
data.meta_site_name: Sarawak Belux - Sales Force, Brand Activation, Merchandising & Marketing Logistics
data.text:
The name Sarawak originates from a specific type of pepper, one of the most popular spices grown on the island of Borneo. Just like pepper adds a dynamic flavour to dishes, our services make a difference and boost your Sales & Marketing results!

We believe that a happy work environment leads to better results. Our Happy Sarawak Culture is all about collaboration, respect and fun in the workplace. We offer:

A supportive and inclusive working environment.

Opportunities for personal and professional growth and development.

Regular team outings and events to foster team spirit.

In our office and warehouse, we employ people with a transparent ‘what-you-see-is-what-you-get’ mentality. With dedication, we go the extra mile for the customer and are true Brand Ambassadors. Our culture is non-hierarchical, allowing everyone to add value from their strengths. The culture is you!
